mapper.select: select substr(phone_no, 1, 11) from REBUILD_BLACK_RED_WHITE_USER where phone_no like '1%'
select substr(APPEAL_TEL, 1, 11) from iop_93011_phone_ods_cct where APPEAL_TEL like '1%' "
select city_id,activity_id,activity_name,final_obj_table_name from activity_base_info a inner join activity_obj_user b on a.activity_id = b.activity_id
select b.* FROM activity_rel_custgroup a inner JOIN cust_group_info b ON a.cust_group_id = b.cust_group_id where ACTIVITY_ID = #{activityId }

select a.*,city_code,b.final_obj_table_name from activity_base_info a inner join activity_obj_user b on a.activity_id = b.activity_id inner join activity_rel_channel c on a.activity_id = c.activity_id inner JOIN base_channel d on c.channel_id = d.channel_id inner join base_city_code e on e.city_id = a.city_id where d.is_syn = 'E' and a.activity_state = '6' limit 1

select a.*,customer_group_id,customer_group_name,customer_num,customer_filter_rule from ooi_MARKING_CAMPAIGN_INFO a left join ooi_activity_summary_effect b on a.activity_id = b.activity_id where a.activity_id = #{activity_id}

select a.*,customer_group_id,customer_group_name,customer_num,customer_filter_rule from activity_base_infoa left join ooi_activity_summary_effect b on a.activity_id = b.activity_id where a.activity_id = '28020190827085181'

select a.*,customer_group_id,customer_group_name,customer_num,customer_filter_rule from ooi_MARKING_ACTIVITY_INFO a left join ooi_activity_summary_effect b on a.activity_id = b.activity_id where a.activity_id = '28020190827085181'
